text: Hacken is an international company. It combats Russia in cyberwar within Russia invasion of Ukraine and the firm that audits the security of technology projects in the Web 3.0 industry and develops products for corporate and user's security in the digital space. The company's offices are represented in Kyiv and Portugal (Lisbon). The headquarters is located in Estonia (Tallinn). == References == Category:Companies of Estonia Category:Technology companies of Europe
title: Hacken
